growthChart.noRecordsInfo: No weight records. Click the "Weight" button to add the first record.

qolAssessment.title: HHHHHMM Scale
qolAssessment.subtitle: Quality of Life Scale (Dr. Alice Villalobos). Score > 35 suggests acceptable quality of life.
qolAssessment.disclaimerTitle: This tool is only a guide
qolAssessment.disclaimerText: End of life decisions should be made together with a veterinarian, considering the complete patient context. This scale does NOT replace professional judgment.
qolAssessment.criticalWarningNote: Critical scores in essential categories require immediate veterinary attention.
qolAssessment.compromisedNote: Compromised quality - evaluate options with veterinarian.

hurt.label: Hurt
hurt.desc: 0 = Severe uncontrolled pain. 10 = No pain or well controlled.

hunger.label: Hunger
hunger.desc: 0 = Not eating at all. 10 = Eating normally.

goodDays.label: More Good Days
goodDays.desc: 0 = Only bad days. 10 = Mostly good days.

vaccineReactions.title: Adverse Vaccine Reactions
vaccineReactions.description: Record and monitor post-vaccination adverse events. Pharmacovigilance system to improve patient safety.
vaccineReactions.searchPlaceholder: Search by vaccine, pet or detail...
vaccineReactions.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this reaction record?

local.label: Local Reaction
local.desc: Swelling, pain or redness at the injection site

empty.tryOtherSearch: Try different search terms or filters.
empty.goodNews: This is good - it means there are no adverse events reported.

info.title: Pharmacovigilance Guide
info.whenToReportText: Any adverse event occurring after vaccination, even if not sure about the causal relationship.
info.observationTimeText: Reactions can occur from minutes to 3-4 weeks post-vaccination.
info.commonReactionsText: Local pain, mild lethargy and low fever are normal and usually resolve within 24-48 hours.
info.urgencyText: Facial edema, difficulty breathing or collapse require immediate veterinary attention.

form.detailedDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe observed symptoms, onset time, progression...

growthCharts.title: Growth Charts
growthCharts.description: Record and monitor your patients' growth. Compare weights by age and breed to detect early anomalies.
growthCharts.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this record?

empty.tryOtherSearch: Try different search terms or filters.
empty.startAdding: Start by adding weight and age records for your patients.

info.title: About Growth Charts
info.whatForText: Growth charts allow you to monitor the development of puppies and kittens, comparing their weight with reference values by breed and age.
info.frequencyText: Record weight weekly during the first 6 months, then monthly until one year of age.
info.warningText: Weight loss, prolonged stagnation, or excessively rapid growth may indicate health problems.
info.tipText: Always weigh at the same time of day, preferably before feeding the patient.

prescriptions.title: Medical Prescriptions
prescriptions.description: Create, manage, and print medical prescriptions for your patients. Control dosages and treatment follow-ups.
prescriptions.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this prescription?

empty.tryOtherSearch: Try different search terms or filters.
empty.startCreating: Start by creating a new medical prescription.

info.title: Important Information
info.controlledText: Controlled medications require a special prescription with a copy for the owner.
info.validityText: Prescriptions are valid for 30 days from issuance, except antibiotics (10 days).
info.dosageText: Always verify the patient's current weight before calculating doses.
info.followupText: Schedule a post-treatment review to verify efficacy.

form.instructionsPlaceholder: Special instructions, precautions, route of administration...

euthanasiaAssessments.title: HHHHHMM Scale
euthanasiaAssessments.subtitle: Clinical Quality of Life Assessment
euthanasiaAssessments.notesPlaceholder: Write additional observation details, recent behavior, or notes for the owner here...
euthanasiaAssessments.disclaimer: "This metric is complementary to the medical diagnosis. The final decision always rests with the consensus between the professional and the family."

hurt.label: Hurt
hurt.desc: Adequate pain control and ability to breathe. 0 (Severe pain) - 10 (No pain)

hunger.label: Hunger
hunger.desc: Interest in food and ability to eat. 0 (No interest) - 10 (Eats well)

hydration.label: Hydration
hydration.desc: Fluid intake and hydration status. 0 (Dehydrated) - 10 (Well hydrated)

hygiene.label: Hygiene
hygiene.desc: Ability to stay clean or be cleaned. 0 (Dirty/Sores) - 10 (Clean)

more_good_days.label: More Good Days
more_good_days.desc: Overall balance of good vs bad days. 0 (All bad) - 10 (All good)
